content.detailedDescription: I work near dia and always see airplanes from a few miles out taking off or landing. this caught my eye because it was much longer than any passenger plane.It had 1 bright white light in the front with 1 red light just behind the white light and 1 white light at the rear. the lights were not flashing. i could not see anything that may of been wing lights. the objects shape and real size is unknown because it was around 1 am and all i seen was the lights moving. what was also strange was the speed of the object. it seemed to be flying way faster than the planes going to and from dia. i was heading west on i-70 after work and it was heading north around 3 or 4 miles away and about 1 mile above the ground.It seemed to be traveling about 4 or 5 times faster and was about 4 times longer than jets i see near the airport. i lost sight of the object as it flew too far north.
content.summary: Longer than any airplaine from same distance. 1 white light in front and back. 1 red light close to front light

content.detailedDescription:
i was taking my daughter's car to be dropped off for repairs.  i was driving west down highland avenue in fort thomas, ky when i saw a hovering white orb high in the sky; suddenly it spit out another white orb around the same size or a little smaller.  the second orb descended at an angle while i was driving.  i pulled over to observe, and the second orb stopped its descent.  i began to drive again and noticed a third white orb in the southwestern sky.  i turned onto route 27 n and saw two more white orbs floating over the hill from the west.
  i dropped off the car and got in my husband's car.  i asked him if he had seen anything, but he only laughed and said that he had seen five deer.
we were going the opposite direction on our way home, and so i was not able to see the orbs.
  i was a little nervous upon seeing the ejected orb and curious as to why
it stopped descending when i pulled over. i was also a bit astounded to see the two orbs coming over the hill. i have had many observations over the summer but have not had time to report them all.  i will try to get those reports in as soon as i can.
content.summary: Hovering white orb spit out another white orb over ky

content.detailedDescription:
I spotted what looked like a small neon blue and silent spherical object or craft, south of me, over the asbury park convention center flying, almost looked to be floating, towards my location, directly over the sand. 
the orb was headed slowly straight north along the coastline with no deviation.
i looked away 4 or 5 times to follow my dog and the spherical figure continued slowly until it was out of sight.
reported to one fisherman on the jetty who did not see it.
also spoke to a group of 4 who did not see it either.
content.summary: Saw blue orb slowly "float" overhead, going north up coast line. silent and steady, looked away 4 times, watched it move out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work, to meet up with my van pool,.  i left my house about 4:02am and it's a 4 mile drive to the vanpool stop.  so it must have been about 4:05am to 4:008am.  i noticed a bright orangeish light above the treetops...About the height you'd expect a helicopter to be...That appeared to be hovering in the distance, directly in front, and above me.  i thought at first that it was a helicopter scanning the highway, but it was too far east of the highway for that.  as i continued toward it, it appeared to be a slender ovoid shape with three large white blinking likes in front, and several red blinking lights on the right side, and several blue blinking lights on the left side.  the colored lights were at the extreme ends on either side of the shape.  when i saw the colors of the lights i thought it must be a jetliner, flying very low.  sometimes, when they are seen head on their movement is imperceptible.  but it was so low!  then i could see that it was moving very slowly and silently, straight north, and slightly, along the east side of the road that i was driving on.  as i got nearer, and almost even with it, i was looking at it from the driver's seat, up through the windshield and to the left.  i slowed almost to a stop and continued to stare at it as it passed me.  there was a very bright, and very full moon, which silhouetted it against the dark, cloudless sky.  as i came even with it, i discerned it to be shaped like a boomerang, or a wing, but with no fuselage, and no tail.  there was absolutely no sound.  i thought i could see windows between the sets of lights, but they were dark.  it appeared to be a dull gray color.  i wanted to stop and get out to snap a picture with my cell phone, but i was worried i'd miss my vanpool to work.  it continued on slowly northward, maybe 100 or more feet, or so above the treetops.  it appeared to be very large.  at first sight i thought it must be a 747, because it appeared that large, but on reflection, i think it was even bigger than that.  and it appeared flat.  i continued down the road, with the object above and behind me, until it was obscured by trees.  i kept thinking that i couldn't be seeing what i was seeing, and it must be some sort of military craft or jet.  but it was so silent, and slow, i don't see how it could be.  i didn't tell anyone about it until i got home, and decided that i would report it, to see if there were any other reported sightings from others on the road at that early hour.  my reaction was one of puzzlement...Trying to figure out what i saw.  it just didn't look like anything i've seen before.
content.summary: Spotted a large boomerang shaped object hovering and moving slowly above the treetops from my car.

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting started at around 9am on october 13, 2010, the sky was sunny, clear no clouds in the sky. my wife was walking our children to school and as she crossed 23rd street and 8th avenue in chelsea she noticed a few people standing at the corner staring and pointing into the sky.  at around 2 pm she went back to pick the kids up from school and noticed a larger crowd staring and pointing in the sky saying look at the ufos. she then called me and told me what was happening and i ran home and got my video camera and went down to 23rd street and 8th avenue. when i got there there was a large crowd around 40-60 people standing around, also there were news trucks from abc news 7 and ny1. what i saw was a large object that was stationary and fading in and out and there were multiple shiny orb shaped objects that were flying by also fading in and out. i was unable to capture the objects on video at 23rd street and 8th avenue, so i started to walk towards 24th street and as i looked north east (towards the empire state building) i noticed a very bright silver orb and it was flying low it was bobbing up and down and wobbling.  it stopped for a few seconds and hovered then shot straight up. i was able to take a video for a few seconds. i did not think i got anything but when i slowed it down you can see the orb flying then when i zoom in alittle you can see that the object is triangle shaped.

during the sighting there were people saying that they saw 2 military jets fly over at hi altitude also at around 6:30pm all planes were diverted in the area due to a gas leak at the regional��� air traffic control center in westbury , new york that controls the 3 major airports newark liberty, laquardia and john f. kennedy airport was closed for hour
content.summary: New york city mass ufo sighting october 13, 2010

content.detailedDescription: Just saw a very bright light in sky took a pic looked at it on phone looked up and it was gone
content.summary: Just saw a very very bright light behind clouds in sky took a pic

content.detailedDescription: I was at the park with my dad , we were standing at the open door of our car , and i looked up and saw this object traveling in the sky. the object kept traveling and went to far to see. my feelings were excitment and curiousity . i first thought it was a baloon . me and my dad were just talking next to our car , he was sitting in the passenger seat and i was standing next to the car with the passenger door open . the actions of the object were it was just traveling like about 20-30 miles an hour . i told my dad to look , and he got out of the car and he could not see it because his eyesight is so bad .
content.summary: I was at the park with my dad , we were standing at the open door of our car , and i looked up and saw this object traveling in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking along 45th ave and 168th in flushing with my son when i first saw the object. it just zoomed over above me and headed towards east at speeds faster than a plane or helicopter, then when i least expected it, it veered right. we're talking an impossible aerodynamic maneuver, unless air force pilots can make, which this wasn't the case. this object made no sound and was roundish and white in color. as i walked towards northern blvd, i kept seeing it (twice) as it zoomed past above, just circling around the area it seemed. finally upon reaching northern blvd. i looked up and it was really high just hovering, kind of wobbling since i could see the sun reflecting off different parts of the surface of the object, only then for it to be completely blinked out and seen flying fast by again, then returning to the exact location in the sky to hover. someone else must have seen this today. this isn't the first sighting in this exact same area i have seen with the naked eye. there must be a portal where they are coming in and out of, or it must be a preferred location or secret base in the area. all i know is, these objects are here and there's no indication they're going anywhere anytime soon.
content.summary: High-speed ufo making impossible turns

content.detailedDescription:
I was on holiday with my wife in scotland, i took lots of pictures, and when i downloaded them to my computer i unfortunately downsized  them to save space, it was a few days later when i was looking at the pics that i saw what looks like two bright objects in one of the pic and another bright object in another pic,when i zoomed into the pics they looked saucer shaped, i did not actually notice the objects until i was looking at my pics on the computer.
i took the pics in tyndrum scotland.
content.summary: Only seen on computer

content.detailedDescription: Myslef and a co-worker observed the object in the sky on our way back from lunch. it clearly stood out as something odd. we are used to seeing planes, helicopters or blimps on a daily basis, but this was clearly neither.Object appeared to be very high in altitude, higher than local planes fly. there were no clouds in the sky, clear sunny day so the object stood out but appeared faint. the object moved very fast and resembled what we both said to be jelly fish like. it almost looked transparent and appeared to us like it was swimming in the sky, but moved very fast. it almost looked transparent or apparation like. headed in what i think was a north west direction. we observed it for almost five minutes until we lost sight of it as it moved away, our view became blocked by buildings. we both are skeptical, especially me but it was so out of the ordinary and strange i had to report it. i am not a roswell believer, etc, etc.. i've explored what it could have been, balloons, satellite or drone, but this was clearly much different in it's patterns and motions. not to mention it looked partially invisible, just faint enough to observe. should have taken video with my iphone, but not sure it would of came out to well for the object was very high up.
content.summary: Myslef and a co-worker observed the object in the sky on our way back from lunch. object appeared to be very high in altitude, higher than local planes fly. object moved very fast and resembled what we both said to be jelly fish like.

content.detailedDescription:
my cousin i would sneak out of my house in the summer time in leo, indiana. i was approx. 10 years and my cousin was 14 years. we would stay out all night and make our way home when the sun started to rise to make sure my mom did not catch us. making our way home from my cousins boyfriends home, we walked south on amstutz road. we were approaching the top of a hill on the side of the road when a boomerang shaped object got our attention. i remember the shape and it being very bright lights, and we heard no sound. it hovered over the tree line. i do not recall any colors except maybe metallic. the fear was so overwhelming i became weak in my knees. i begged for my cousin to take me to the door of the house we were in front of. she refused because she didn't want to get in trouble from my mother. i was terrified of my mom and getting caught but the fear this object gave me was overwhelming and i was willing to take an ass beating from my mother. after she refused to go to the house we ran home. i totally forgot about this event until a recent program recalled this memory. i think the fear i had caused me to push it out of my mind. when i recalled this event i immediately called my cousin and she instantly confirmed what happened. i read a story on your website and what the witness saw was exactly what i thought i saw. they also had the extreme fear. below is the story i read.

1989 cory, indiana      time 10:00 pm       duration:  5 minutes maximum


received from wuofd 11 december, 2002
content.summary: The shape was boomerang, it hovered with no sound and very bright. fear devoured me and i almost passed out

content.detailedDescription: It was 6am, the sun had not come up yet, i was in our backyard with my dog when i observed a spherical object, which i thought was a star before it began to fly over a nearby apartment building and directly overhead. as it passed directly 90 degrees overhead its brightness increased dramatically and reduced back to its original intensity after a few seconds.
content.summary: Circular/spherical object passing over household

content.detailedDescription:
1. my father was driving home from the store while i was in the passenger seat.
2. at first i looked at it and thought it was the north star even though we weren't facing that direction. after around five minutes it got very bright and it slowly moved.
3. i thought it was a really bright star when then my father said "why is it so bright?"
4. after the first one hovered and flew in a curve i lost sight of it because it got dimmer and dimmer. when i looked back at the same direction it started another one appeared in the same spot and was blinked red on one side and three white lights on the other side of it. after around a hour we followed one that changed it's path and sounded like a jet and was going very slow above us, i had a camera with me because i ran back to my house to make sure it was a u.F.O. i snapped one really good photo of it and when i tried to take a picture of the others they failed or looked just like stars, at one point i took a photo of a orange orb looking u.F.O but when i saw it in person it looked like a distant star.
5. the 1st photo was taken later on when i grabbed my camera.
the second photo was taken when i tried to focus on one of the moving ships or orbs. the third photo was taken when i tried to take a picture of one of the ships moving fairly fast and was it was probably around 10 miles away.
the fourth photo was taken when i tried to take a picture of one of the ships when it hovered in the air and changed from blinking to a white star.
the fifth photo was taken when one of the ships that left the path flew over me and sounded like a jet, i was very impressed with this photo because the ship was not that far but i thought it might have been a plane or jet but it went to slow and this photo makes it proof that it wasn't a plane. 
6. after around two hours of the same path of that the ships went by in we went home because it was getting late and i had school the next day.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lot's of red and white lights as well as star like stationary u.F.O's

content.detailedDescription: I looked to the south horizon above the fleet farm in oakdale at 9:00 pm sept 18th and saw three very bright red lights. they were moving north in my direction. i watched for a few seconds and realized that none of them were blinking. they appeared to just glow a bright red. i caught my dad's attention and asked him to look. the only thing we could hear were other airplanes crossing their paths. airplanes were distinctly different in that they could be heard, even at greater distances, while also running with the proper flashing navigation lights. the red orbs however were all coming from the south and heading north following the exact same path--one after another. i watched for ten minutes and counted over ten within that time span. one group of two were tailing each other at a close distance--approximately 500-1000 ft. oddly, every single one of them just vanished the moment they reached the point perpendicular to my position. i could see the stars in the sky; the night was clear.
content.summary: 10 plus red orbs in a row

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my living room working on my computer when i received a phone call from my girlfriend who was out with our kids taking a walk. she stated that she was one street over from our house and that she was watching a "weird light in the sky" and when i asked what it was doing she stated that it was bouncing up and down in the sky and moving in an odd way that she had never seen before and that it wasn't making any noise at all. i could here my son in the back ground talking about the light and how he thought it wasn't right. i proceeded to put my shoes on and i asked her where the lights where and i determined that i could walk a very short distance to the top of a nearby hill and see it. i hung the phone up and ran from my house to the top of the hill where i witnessed 2 lights which appeared to be on a single object moving in the sky, the lights were red and green orbs which were very bright and steady and not pulsating. they moved from right to left very quickly and then quickly decended down behind a row of trees (there was a cell phone tower in the approx. area of the object and the object was higher than the tower in the air, the trees the object went behind were right behind the tower. after the event i drove to the tower and there was no working lights on the tower) i watched the object move behind the trees and then it acended back in to the sky. at that point i ran to my neighbors house which was very close to where i was and asked him to come see the object, but by the time we got back to my original viewing point the object had disappeared. we waited for a time but there was no sign of the object again. after returning home and speaking to my girlfriend she stated that she had the object in sight along with both of my children for approx. 15 minutes and she watched the object move in the air in a way that she has never seen an aircraft move before. she stated that the object was "bouncing" in the air and then it moved at an extreme rate of speed from side to side, this all occurred prior to me seeing the object. after i lost sight with the object my girlfriend stated that the object decended back below the trees and appeared to land in an unoccupied wooded area not far from residences. after i arrived home we got in to my truck and drove to the approx. area where i thought the object was and we drove down a state highway approx. 4 miles to the local airport, upon arriving at the airport we didn't see any air craft activity and the field and main hangar was dark. we then drove down along the local river and did not see anything out of normal, we then drove up to the area where she thought she saw it land, after driving around the perimeter of the area there were no signs of any activity and there were no lights in the woods. after i asked my girlfriend stated that after the object disappeared that it never reappeared again and i also never saw it again. during the event there was other air traffic in the area, but they were easy to identify as air planes where as this object defied anything i have ever seen.
content.summary: Lights movng in the sky without noise

content.detailedDescription: Hi, my daughters and i stepped out on the deck to smoke. it was in the evening around 6:30pm ,i looked up like i always do and i noticed what looked like comets , and i said to my daughter,  hey look, comets! we watched two of them acending northward, my daughter said she thought they were jets.. i said no because the trail that the objects left behind seem to move with the object, a jet stream leaves a lasting trail, i told my daughter to get the binoculars to get a better look . she ran up the hill which is our backyard to get a view but as she was doing that i told her did you see that! it was a round shape thing  that appeared as the comet looking objects were acending , i ran to get the camera , when i retured within a minute it was gone, then the comet shaped objects stopped acsending and stopped in midair and it formed into a disk shape at an angle and stayed stationary for at least a minte and half, i tried to take pics of the staionary objects, but the they blended with the setting sun and it was like they've disenigrated and nothing showed up on the camera, but i was able to capture a picture of the comet shaped  object. i felt more exicited than  scared, but i did feel that i needed to report it. thank you
content.summary: My daughter and i stepped out onto the deck, we noticed what look like comets, i didnt think they were jets because they didnt leave a longlasting  trail,the trail seemed to move with the object

content.detailedDescription:
I got home this evening and noticed we had some high clouds overhead and thought it a good idea to set up my video camera and take a half hour video and then speed it up.  looks cool sometimes.

so, i set the camera up to take an mp4 video for 30 minutes and walked away.

when the camera finished i took out the sd card, put it into my laptop and opened photoshop elements 10 and sped the video up 4000%.  i noticed this black object popping in and out.

i figured it was lighting or something so i had the software correct lighting.  thin i got what looks like lightning coming from the same spot in the sky and (almost) going back up.

i checked the full length video and the black thing is there popping in and out of view, but have not as yet tried the "lighting effect".

i posted the vids on youtube (jarreds dad) and then facebook.

after a while i figured i'd send you guys links to see what your thoughts are.  so here you go.
content.summary: Took a cloud video and sped it up.  saw a dark object pop in and out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting the dog out of my hourse around 9:30pm when a very bright star (?) caught my eye, i got the binoculars and it was pulsating colors of blue to red to orange to gold.  it was stationary in the north for about half an hour then slowly moved to the east.
i did take a picture with my iphone but i can't see anything on the picture, maybe if it was enhanced.
content.summary: Pulsating lights, stationary then moved east, extremely bright colors

content.detailedDescription: I was on vacation, staying at a hotel just off 22 at the 309 exit. when i turned off 309 and headed south to the hotel i saw the orange orb-like object and it had a huge orange glowing tail behind it, but only briefly. the huge tail and the unique orange glow were what caught my eye, it was almost impossible not to see it if you looked anywhere south at that time. after 5 seconds or so the tail disappeared but the orange orb remained. i quickly drove into the parking lot and stopped so i could get out and get a better look. it disappeared completely for approximately 20 seconds then re-appeared slightly east of the last position i saw it in. it seemed just a bit smaller at this time, still bigger than a star but smaller than when i saw it with the tail. slowly it grew a bit bigger once more, then started moving east toward the atlantic, seemingly due east at first then it seemed to change direction and head south east. the object made several direction changes during the entire time i watched it, none drastic, but definitely enough of a direction change that there was no question it changed course. initially i thought maybe it was a meteor burning up in the atmosphere but it wasn't moving very fast at all and as i previously stated the tail disappeared but the orb remained where it was for at least 15 seconds before it disappeared and re-appeared. this makes the 3rd glowing orange orb that i've seen in the past 2 years, and at this point i was actually excited to see it. i lost sight of the object because it kept heading east/south east until it was too far away to see anymore. there were plenty of planes in the area due to traffic at lvi, and this object was much bigger and easily discernible from any common man-made aircraft. i hope someone else saw this one, it was awesome. if i were to guess the amount of time i actually watched it, i would say 4-6 minutes total. i was too damn excited to note the exact time i started and stopped watching, but it was somewhere around 11 p.M. sept. 6th 2013 (a friday night), and wasn't around for long before it moved so far south and east that i couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Glowing orange object with bried flame-like tail, then tail disappeared and object moved e/se on various path.

content.detailedDescription:
I went to look out my living room window which faces the city and a good view of the sky. i noticed the object in low the sky, at first i thought it was the north star it was so bright. then i noticed the star had a metallic look to it, and had gotten brighter. then i thought perhaps it was the sun reflecting off a plane. impossible. it would have been an extremely large plane if thatd been the case. strange enough it was as if this object knew it was being watched, it grew very bright, and then began to dim until it completely vanished.

ive seen many different craft in the new castle area numerous times on different months and dates.
content.summary: North star sized orb in new castle sky

content.detailedDescription: Llegaba a mi casa de habitaci������n dado que me dispon������a a viaja hacia otra ciudad. observ������ tres objetos que se mov������an entre nubes. muy brilantes y de forma de rombo. entre a mi casa y saqu������ la filmadora e inici������ la filmaci������n. solo pude detectar un solo objeto el cual qued������ grabado. al inicio de la filmacion se nota la forma del objeto, luego el objeto, en un instante, se cambia de tama������o a casi un punto, luego desaparece y luego instantaneamente vuelve a aparecer de tama������o inicial y luego desaparece entre nubes.
content.summary: Objeto de luz de forma romboide, se movã�a con otros dos

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch looking across the horizon, i noticed an object at tree top high blinking red, green blue and white. as i watched the spectacle i noticed it moving a bit at first, i blew it off as a star. about a half hour later i returned to my porch to smoke a cigarette and noticed it was a little higher in the sky and still moving, this time it was definitely moving about the sky and not with the earths rotation. this is not the first time i have seen something like this. what was it????
content.summary: Flashing lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: My father in law took photos of the sunrise in the margate area in kwa zulu natal in south africa. a few months later he showed me his vacation photos, as he like to take photos of mother nature. i picked up this triangular shaped object in the clouds. i do not know what it is, but sure as hell it isn't a plane.
content.summary: Trianular shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down montezuma rd in san diego from college ave towards el cajon blvd when i noticed out of the upper portion of my front windshield that there was a green light coming through the low cloud cover so i smiled and glanced up to see the airplane as the only green light i assumed would come through was tht of a plane wing when i caught something which apparently came from space so fast that coming through the clouds so quickly made it seem as if a plane was just decending but then it stopped under the clouds and my eyes widened and then it shot 90 degrees from the outer space to earth direction to east from my position like a shooting star. the object was clearly two colors of green and blue and appeared oval in my memory though moving like thst may have made a circular ufo appear oval. my initial response was "finally and wow, that just happened, but despite my prefrontal cortex saying "cool, everything is okay and that was awesome" my body was freaking out. my organs seemed to be in shock. it was hard to deal with and began effecting my mind because if my brain and body are acting this way even though i prefer to act another then this must be more serious then i imagined. i recalled a study where distilled water was effected by an object or label and decided to go to the park up the street midnight and get palm fruit to mix with distilled water so i could bathe in it and hope the vibration did something for my organs and mind. it seemed to help and ever since ive been watching the sky, trying to meditate and communicate, searching for more answers than ever before. i have always been higher consciousness, since a very young age, but this was the first time i saw something by myself with such a low environmental influence or prank potential to take the credit. i tried finding a site to connect and report the sighting and see if anyone else was talking bout it but never found anything. after seeing serius with dr steven greer, i found this site and reported it asap, with about an hour digging up details to recall the time and date, though ill never forget the situation. thank you for your time,
alexandros angelos tsakopoulos
content.summary: Saw a light decending through cloud cover thought was green light from airplane came down and shot 90 degrees like a shooting star

content.detailedDescription: These are the words from my son. he said he woke up around 4am yesterday the 17th of sept. notice while looking out the window of his bedroom some lights hovering over the apartment across the street. it did not move much and it had lights flickering from the bottom that look like wings. the lights were red, blue, green, and the were in sets of 2 a row of three. to be more precise it had two rows of three on each wing. the craft still had somewhat of a triangular shape with wide nose of a front end. my son also went on to say it moved on a path as though it was being control by a "remote control".
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering over a apt complex across the street from 4th floor balcony

content.detailedDescription: Traveling cross country.  very fascinated by the local changes in landscapes. as  passing near boise, i saw a flash, seemed like a huge vessel, slow down, and approach the horizon from my right as i was northwest bound in afternoon.  i was shocked because sun was clearly still mid afternoon.  i pulled off, just to watch.  vessel hovered for about 10 minutes, then took incredible change in speed and direction from hover.  this vessel took off in a split second or not more than two to the left of my windshield.  it made a huge checkmark in the sky, and was gone with no noise. trails, and no other trace.  i blinked and it was gone, not horizontally but vertically when it approached horizontily. flight observed as characterized with north westerly, slowing to hover, then sudden exit of stratosphere, not directional associated with north, east, south, or west.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Visual track of ship hover and gone.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i took pictures of the sunset at the aerie, west of doe mountain in sedona, arizona. while we were waiting for the sun to set, i took pictures of the surrounding area. neither my husband nor i witnessed any object in the sky while i was taking the attached shot. 

tonight i transferred the photos from my camera to my computer and i found a shot with an object that i cannot identify. 

i am hoping a photo expert can rule out a cloud or a flying bug.
content.summary: Taking pictures of sunset at the aerie near sedona's doe mountain

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were walking our dogs approximately 10:30 pm on 9/14/13. as we rounded a ccrner and looked to the nw we saw three glowing red lights, each about the size and brightness of a bright star, but they had a solid glow and did not twinkle. they were approx. 30 degrees off the horizon, and in a triangle formation seperated by approx 20 degrees from left to right.  it was not clear if they were moving or not.  both of our immediiate reactions were what in the heck were we looking at - it was certainly unlike anything we had seen before.  we both stopped and reached for our cell phone cameras.  my son was able to take one photo, in which the lights are visible.  we started running down the street to the top of a small hill to see if we could get a better view, but the lights disappeared in under 1 minute.
content.summary: Observed 3 solid red glowing lights in nw sky in triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: I was putting trash out and noticed how bright the moon was tonight, turned around go back toward the house and i looked south west just over some trees and there was one of the brightest things i have ever seen siting there. i just stood there for awhile in amazement.  to the right of this object was a dim star. i immediately ran in the house to get someone to make sure i wasnt hollusonating.  they were also as amazed as i. the object made no noise. it was beautiful.  hopefully it wasn't anything bad. we brought out the camera but the orb had went too far below the trees to catch it. will be more prepared if theres a next time.
content.summary: Orb was extremely bright, brighter than the full moon tonight. it was amazing. not man made, no sound eventually went below trees. wow!
